name: Dicey (Seet)
description:
Dicey

HTML version not very stable. If you would like to have a better experience, please download the Windows version instead. 

Assign powers to your dice. Launch your dice at enemies and wield its powers.

Mouse only required. Move your cursor to move around and left-click to dash. Dash into the dice to launch it into your enemies to defeat them. The power corresponding to the number you assigned will be activated when the dice face fully lands.

Unlock new powers and strategise where to place them on your dice. The higher the number you place them on, the more powerful the ability will be when you activate it. 

Attribution: "Thunder, Very Close, No Rain, C.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org
